title: Recurrent spatio-temporal modeling of check-ins in location ...
summary: This work focuses on recurrent spatio-temporal modeling of check-ins, relating to temporal point processes and location-based social network analysis. It defines point processes and their different descriptions.
usefulness_reason: The title and content explicitly mention 'spatio-temporal modeling' and 'temporal point processes', directly addressing 'Spatio Temporal' and 'Point Process'. The discussion of 'check-ins in location-based social networks' implies a 'Contextual dataset'.
